                               Flappy Game(v 1.0.0)

Created by -> Ramayan Mardi
Gmail -> ramayanmardi@gmai.com
github -> ramayanbindas.github.com

Shortcuts:
Click -> Left Mouse Button/Enter Key
Back -> x key
Pause -> p key
Resume -> Space key / p key
Restart -> r key
Quit -> Escape key


This is the remake of the game Flappy Bird, I want to add new features on top
of it in future version.
Features:
 - Able to play online.
 - Multiplayer mode
 - Lives
